setSession(com.google.android.gms.fitnes.Description: Sets the session for this request.

Throws: if the data point is null
if an aggregate data point for this data source is already added
addAggregateDataPoint(com.google.android.Description: Adds the specified aggregate data point for this request. Only one aggregate data point per data source is allowed for a session.

Throws: if the builder doesn't have enough state to create a valid request
build().Description: Finishes building and returns the request.

Throws: if the data set is null or empty
if data set for this data source is already added
addDataSet(com.google.android.gms.fitnes.Description: Adds the specified data set for this request. Only one data set per data source is allowed for a session.

ClassDesc: Builder used to create new SessionInsertRequest.
